item.title: Ham and Cheese Crepes
item.description: Ingredients Crepes (see Savory Crepes Recipe) Ham Cheese (many kinds work well) Instructions Prepare Ingredients Cut ham and cheese into cubes. Create Savory Crepes Create savory crepes as seen in the Savory Crepes Recipe Assemble Crepes Load half the crepe with ham and cheese, then roll it up. Cook Crepes Place the rolled-up crepe into a hot buttered pan with the end of the crepe on the bottom. Cook until the cheese melts and the crepe browns slightly.

item.title: Savory Crepes
item.description: Ingredients 1 Cup all purpose flour 1 cup milk 2 tbps melted butter 2 eggs

item.title: Sweet crepes
item.description: Ingredients 1 Cup all purpose flour 1 cup milk 2 tbps melted butter 2 eggs 1/4 cup sugar 1/4 tsp - 1 tbps vanilla extract
